about_the_game:
Manage Crew & Officers

Recruit experienced officers from all around the galaxy to build a competent team that will pilot your giant mothership and operate all of its systems. Build your crew from aliens of different races with a variety of specializations and train them to achieve the most versatile combinations.

Control the Damage

Your damage control teams can handle fire outbreaks, cyberattacks, hull piercings and depressurisation, enemy bombardments, and aliens teleporting inside the mothership – but not all of this at once. Assess which threats need to be dealt with first in order to survive.

Survive & Fight Back

Use sci-fi weapon technology such as starfighters, lasers, energy shields, and maneuvering skills to fend off enemy attacks. Make sure that any enemy who dares to attack will end up swallowed by the void.

Make Difficult Decisions

Lower the shields to send out an attack – or shield yourself from hostile bombardments and lose the opportunity to destroy the weakened enemy. Decide whether to use your mobile firepower to defend allies from an enemy attack or to make a profit from an optional objective.


Plan & Coordinate Devastating Attacks

The art of war has changed since the days of the Pacific War. Timing and precision are key to effective attacks. Coordinate your starfighters and cannon fire to breach enemy defenses and deliver the final blow.

Almighty Armada

Just a mothership alone is not enough. Build your armada to always be prepared for what you may encounter in endless space. Choose from many unique spaceships and show enemies your might.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows 7,8 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 Ti / Intel HD 620
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K / AMD FX-8320 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 / Radeon R9 290X
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: The endless expanse of space has never been such a dangerous place. Take command as a Space Fleet Admiral who will face the challenge of galactic war and determine the fate of the universe.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
